input_query:
You are visiting San Francisco for the day and want to meet as many friends as possible. Solve the problem by considering various different schedules and picking the best one to optimize your goals.

Travel distances (in minutes):
Nob Hill to Richmond District: 14.
Nob Hill to Financial District: 9.
Nob Hill to North Beach: 8.
Nob Hill to The Castro: 17.
Nob Hill to Golden Gate Park: 17.
Richmond District to Nob Hill: 17.
Richmond District to Financial District: 22.
Richmond District to North Beach: 17.
Richmond District to The Castro: 16.
Richmond District to Golden Gate Park: 9.
Financial District to Nob Hill: 8.
Financial District to Richmond District: 21.
Financial District to North Beach: 7.
Financial District to The Castro: 23.
Financial District to Golden Gate Park: 23.
North Beach to Nob Hill: 7.
North Beach to Richmond District: 18.
North Beach to Financial District: 8.
North Beach to The Castro: 22.
North Beach to Golden Gate Park: 22.
The Castro to Nob Hill: 16.
The Castro to Richmond District: 16.
The Castro to Financial District: 20.
The Castro to North Beach: 20.
The Castro to Golden Gate Park: 11.
Golden Gate Park to Nob Hill: 20.
Golden Gate Park to Richmond District: 7.
Golden Gate Park to Financial District: 26.
Golden Gate Park to North Beach: 24.
Golden Gate Park to The Castro: 13.

CONSTRAINTS: You arrive at Nob Hill at 9:00AM. Emily will be at Richmond District from 7:00PM to 9:00PM. You'd like to meet Emily for a minimum of 15 minutes. Margaret will be at Financial District from 4:30PM to 8:15PM. You'd like to meet Margaret for a minimum of 75 minutes. Ronald will be at North Beach from 6:30PM to 7:30PM. You'd like to meet Ronald for a minimum of 45 minutes. Deborah will be at The Castro from 1:45PM to 9:15PM. You'd like to meet Deborah for a minimum of 90 minutes. Jeffrey will be at Golden Gate Park from 11:15AM to 2:30PM. You'd like to meet Jeffrey for a minimum of 120 minutes.

activities.notes: Meet Jeffrey from 11:15 to 13:15 for 120 minutes
Meet Deborah from 13:45 to 15:15 for 90 minutes
Meet Margaret from 16:00 to 17:15 for 75 minutes
Meet Ronald from 17:30 to 18:15 for 45 minutes
Meet Emily from 19:00 to 19:15 for 15 minutes

schedule.summary: The schedule optimizes meeting all friends within their available time slots while minimizing travel time and ensuring all minimum meeting durations are met.
